q: and she knows we love her.'' New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand was also there when it happened. She said once Gabrielle Giffords heard her husband's voice, she opened her eyes. All of a sudden she started to struggle to open her eyes. And so Mark Kelson saw that and said--` Open your eyes Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes.' She kept struggling and struggling and Mark Kelson kept encouraging her. And within a moment she literally opened her eyes. The doctor was unbelievably excited because this was such great progress, said Kirsten Gillibrand . New York's junior senator got to know the Arizona representative during their time together in the House. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . Tight end Brent Celek agreed, when he spoke via phone yesterday with a group of reporters from his minivacation getaway in Michigan: Sometimes he's taking some big-time hits, where maybe other guys would get flagged and he's not. Hopefully, they change it. He's a quarterback, too. He's the same as everybody else. Just because he's maybe a little bit more athletic and faster and can run, he shouldn't be penalized.
